title: glazed chicken breast with tomato, artichoke and watercress
ingredients: 2 x 225g/8oz corn-fed chicken breasts, wing bone in, trimmed
1 beef tomato, core removed, cut into eight pieces
Â¼ cucumber, halved lengthways, seeds removed and thinly sliced
small handful fresh chives, cut into 2cm/1in lengths, soaked in water
6 sprigs fresh chervil, soaked in water
salt and freshly ground black pepper
